overview:
Professionally, Arvind works for Weatherbug in the capacity of an Product Manager. He is responsible for managing the portfolio of mobile/tablet applications and emerging platform apps for WeatherBug.

Arvind has extensive experience in consumer based product management roles and have worked on products ranging from information portals to high end multi-screen experiences (Mobile, Tablet, Platforms). He is passionate about building user friendly products which sets the trend for a particular industry.

He has extensive experience in building mobile applications, hybrid frameworks and social products across retail, pharma, weather and gaming industries. He has designed, owned and managed top ranked apps in several app stores.

Arvind also loves organizing and attending tech conferences across the globe. Arvind is a part of a non-profit organization called “The Knowledge Foundation” which organizes tech based conferences across India.

Arvind has an MBA degree in Systems Management from S.P.Jain Institute of Management. Arvind also holds an Masters in Information Technology defree from Virginia Tech.

Arvind is also a sports enthusiast and loves coaching kids on Cricket, Badminton and Tennis.
